alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:58PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Platte County through 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Y-O Ranch, or over Wheatland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Chugcreek, Bordeaux, Y-O Ranch and Slater. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 72 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County
